Fungal Body: Immune to critical hits
Halo Of Spores: R10' Use Reaction to inflict 1d10 HP necrotic (DC 16 Con neg)
Mounted Combatant: Adv on melee attacks on unmounted foe smaller than mount, redirect attack on mount to self, mount takes no damage on Dex save, half on fail
Spreading Spores: R30' Halo Of Spores (DC 16 Con neg)
Symbiotic Entity: Expend 1 Wild Shape use to gain 80 temporary HP, 2d6 HP necrotic Halo Of Spores damage, and +1d6 HP necrotic on melee hits for 10 min or until temporary HP lost

Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 4; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 2; D7: 2; D8: 1; D9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: D: 8; W: 6 Spell DC: D: 16; W: 14
Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Target beast convinced of good intent (Wis neg) for 1 dy
Animate Dead (Spores3 Necr): R10' Bones or corpse becomes skeleton or zombie, obeys R60' self commands for 1 dy
Aura Of Life (Wildfire4 Abju): 30' radius gives resistance to necrotic damage, raises nonhostile creatures w/0 HP to 1 HP for conc or 10 min
Awaken (D5 Tran): Touched beast or plant gains Intelligence 10, speech, and movement and becomes friendly for 30 dy
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self perceives through touched beast's senses for conc or 1 hr
Blight (Spores4 Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Con half (plant Disadv, 64 HP on fail))
Blindness/Deafness (Spores2 Necr): R30' Inflicts choice of blindness or deafness on target (Con neg) for 1 min
Burning Hands (Wildfire1 Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (Dex half)
Chill Touch (Spores0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts %1d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 1d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Cloudkill (Spores5 Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (Con half), moves away 10'/rd for conc or 10 min
Confusion (Spores4 Ench): R90' Creatures in 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack adjacent/20% act normally (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Conjure Animals (D3 Conj): R60' Summons obedient fey creatures for conc or 1 hr
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summons obedient fey for conc or 1 hr
Conjure Minor Elementals (D4 Conj): R90' Summons obedient elementals for conc or 1 hr
Contagion (Spores5 Necr): Touched poisoned, diseased for 7 dy after failing 3 Con saves (3 successes neg)
Cure Wounds (Wildfire1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 HP
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Touched sees 60' in dark for 8 hr
Feign Death (D3 Necr): Touched appears dead for 1 hr
Fire Shield (Wildfire4 Evoc): Self gains resistance to heat or cold damage, successful melee attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' 10 10' cu inflicts 7d10 HP fire (Dex half)
Flame Strike (Wildfire5 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (Dex half)
Flaming Sphere (Wildfire2 Conj): R60' 5' diameter sphere inflicts 2d6 HP fire (Dex half), moves 30'/rd for conc or 1 min
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Gaseous Form (Spores3 Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc or 1 hr
Gentle Repose (Spores2 Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 dy
Greater Restoration (D5 Abju): Touched becomes unexhausted, uncharmed, unpetrified, or uncursed or regains ability or HP
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc or 1 min
Gust Of Wind (D2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Str neg), inflicts half movement for conc or 1 min
Healing Word (D1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+2 HP
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Mass Cure Wounds (Wildfire5 Evoc): R60' 6 targets in 30' radius regain 3d8 + 2 HP
Plant Growth (Wildfire3 Tran): R150' Overgrows 100' radius or enriches 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Con neg)
Polymorph (D4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wis neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights 10' radius for 10 min, self can make ranged spell attack inflicting 4d8 HP
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc or 1 hr
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Con not poisoned)
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R50' Items in 50' radius fall upward for conc or 1 min
Revivify (Wildfire3 Necr): Restores touched 1-minute-old corpse to life w/1 HP
Scorching Ray (Wildfire2 Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Self polymorphs for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Touched club gains +8 attacks, inflicts 1d8 HP for 1 min
Sunburst (D8 Evoc): 60' radius inflicts 12d6 HP radius and blindness (Con half, no blindness) for 1 min
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cu inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Con half, no push)
Wall Of Fire (D4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dex half) for conc or 1 min
Wall Of Stone (D5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' panels for conc or 10 min
Wall Of Thorns (D6 Conj): R120' 60'x10' wall inflicts 7d8 HP piercing (Dex half) for conc or 10 min
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: Unlimited Wild Shape
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Twinkling Constellations: Improve Starry Form effects to 2d8, Dragon form gives 20' fly; switch between forms 1/rd
Beast Spells: Cast spells during Wild Shape
Blazing Revival: R120' Extinguish Wildfire Spirit to regain 70 HP when reduced to 0 HP 1/long rest
Cauterizing Flames: R30' Create spectral flame for 1 min when creature dies; use to heal or inflict 2d10+2 HP fire on another in same space 6/long rest
Cosmic Omen: R30' Use Reaction to impose +1d6 or -1d6 on attack, ability, and saving throws 6/long rest
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Enhanced Bond: Fire spells inflict +1d8 HP fire, healing spells heal +1d8 HP, can cast through Wildfire Spirit
Fungal Infestation: R10' Use Reaction to animate creature that dies into 1 HP zombie that obeys self mental commands for 1 hr 2/long rest
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Star Map: Know Guidance cantrip, cast Guiding Bolt 6/long rest
Starry Form: Wild Shape into form of Archer (R60' ranged spell inflicts 2d8+2 HP radiant), Chalice (R30' healing spell restores 2d8+2 to another), or Dragon (minimum 10 on concentration rolls)
Summon Wildfire Spirit: R30' Expend 1 Wild Shape use to inflict 2d6 HP fire in 10' radius (DC 16 Dex neg) and summon Wildfire Spirit (AC 13, HP 105, MV/Fly 30', Attack R60' +8 inflicts 1d6+6 HP fire, Teleport targets in 5' radius) for 1 hr
Wild Companion: Expend 1 Wild Shape use to cast Find Familiar to summon fey, lasting 10 hr
Wild Shape: Transform into CR 1 creature for 10 hr unlimited/short rest
Notes
* Ability Boosts: +1 Constitution
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
